title: Associates
description: The charismatic Alfonzo Diaz, his wife Selange, Giuseppe, Nico and the family return in this latest edition of an underground hit, many readers call 'raw' and 'addictive.'Alfonzo knows what is not spoken is found in actions. Observe, listen and often truth is revealed.“Man associates ideas not according to logic or verifiable exactitude, but according to his pleasure and interests. It is for this reason that most truths are nothing but prejudices.”- Remy de Gourmont
author: S.W. Frank
